content: Certainly, Minister. I can certainly work with you to establish a committee to investigate the recent layoffs and identify any underlying causes or factors that may be contributing to the problem. The committee could be tasked with conducting research and analysis, gathering data on the affected industries and regions, and engaging with relevant stakeholders, including companies, labor unions, and other interest groups. The committee could also explore potential policy solutions or interventions to address the root causes of the layoffs and promote job growth and economic development. Would you like me to start the process of establishing such a committee, Minister?
